title: An in situ phase transformation induced mesoporous heterointerface for the alkaline hydrogen evolution reaction
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,14886-14893
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02063D, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Zhiping Lin, Zongpeng Wang, Tianchen Jin, Ting Jiang, Longfei Ding, Shijie Shen, Jitang Zhang, Wenwu Zhong
In situ phase transformation is achieved from single-phase Co3O4 to CoO/CoP hybrid phases, which acts as a highly efficient electrocatalyst for the hydrogen evolution reaction.
